text: læa xallxh thrng kahnd khukhrxng kæ phwk cea sung ma cak hmu phwk cea læa thrng thahı phwk cea mi luk læa ha kn cak khukhrxng khxng phwk cea læa thrng prathan ri ski cak sing di «kæ phwk cea dangnan tx sing thec phwk khea sraththa læa tx khwam pordpran khx ngxallxh phwk khea nerkhun kranan hrux
